about_the_game:
Introducing the memory game “Memory Fireworks” where you can set off fireworks!
Remember the colors and locations of the fireworks and set off at the right time.
A fusion of fireworks and memory games!? The game content is such that both children and adults can enjoy it.

◆Rules
First, some fireworks will be set off, so remember the colors and locations of the fireworks.
Once you have memorized the fireworks, set them off in the same way as the memorized colors and positions, following a picture of fireworks that ticks off a certain rhythm.
If you get the wrong color, it's game over, and if the position or timing is off, you lose points.
If the white bar reaches the top when you reach the end, you have cleared the game.

◆How to play
Select the color of the fireworks you want to launch using the button below, tap it, and the fireworks will launch there.
There are up to 100 levels, and the last one is difficult to clear even for adults.
Aim for all Clear! Let's surpass adults!

◆Free mode
You can set off 6 types of fireworks at any time you like.
Create your own wonderful fireworks display.

short_description: Remember the color, location, and timing of the fireworks that were launched, and try to launch them in the same way. Although the rules are simple, it is deep and you will be drawn to the beautiful visuals.
